newsitem.title: USA: National Patent says awarded contracts.
newsitem.headline: National Patent says awarded contracts.

text.p: National Patent Development Corp said Thursday its wholly owned subsidiary, General Physics Corporation, has been awarded new contracts totaling more than $17 million from new and existing clients over the last several weeks.

National Patent provides training, engineering, environmental, analytical and technical support services to Fortune 500 companies, commercial nuclear and fossil power utilities, the US Departments of Defense and Energy, and other commercial and government customers.
